attributes.additional_details:
The Government should cancel January  Btec Exams due to the disruption of Covid-19. Students will be mixing bubbles, which will increase the case of covid-19 being spread. This should he treated with the action as Alevel and GCSE students. 
We want the government to provide a way for students to still achieve the grades they truly deserve, without putting students at risk. As they are most likely to get infected.
attributes.background: We want the British government to cancel Btec exams, like how they have cancelled GCSE and Alevel exams summer exams . Btec students are more valuable as they are expected to do exams during a national lockdown, whilst the cases and death continue to crise
